text: Melania Trump arrived in the sunshine at
the Royal Hospital Chelsea to meet an
audience of young and old she joined in
poppy making with pupils from a local
primary school and seemed pleased to
have their help the first lady wanted to
meet children and have the opportunity
to promote her b-best campaign which
focuses on young people's well-being the
Chelsea pensioners didn't know about her
visit until this morning but they were
delighted to meet the first lady who was
hosted on her visit by the prime
minister's husband Phillip May did she
win you two over absolutely person she
met Oliver she did and she came across
magic didn't but I mean how else you
think she'll go back and think this is
one of the better things she did I
honestly do believe that she rounded off
this trip with a game of bowls
despite her high heels she seemed to
take it in her stride Sean lead BBC news
at the Royal Hospital Chelsea
